Version 4.1.1
 Bugfix for Android 7 
 Using pattern to support different versions 

Version 4.1
 Using DayNight Theme.

Version 4.0 Upgrade tech stack to newer version. Use gradle for builds. Add English language support.
Version 3.3.1
 Bugfix: If no date was entered yet, the app crashed when using the -Share with friends- menu item.
 Bugfix: Switching from time machine mode to today's date updates the data.
 Thanks Jens 

Version 3.3
 Size information and values revised
 For the Lite version:
 Admob Standalone SDK replaced by Google Play Service.
 Ad request only when the app is actually active.
 

Version 3.2
 Bugfix widget in landscape mode
 Bugfix widget display when date is outside validation range
 Performance optimization
 

Version 3.1.2
 Bugfix update error
 

Version 3.1.1
 Spelling corrected
 

Version 3.1
 Baby sounds in About (Easter Egg) 
 "Send feedback email" in menu.
 "Share with friends" functionality in menu
 Icons added to menu items
 

Version 3.0
 Time machine: The current date can be temporarily changed.
 Improved design and more informative message when an incorrect date is entered.
 

Version 2.2
 Bugfix calculation error for days until due date due to daylight saving time
 Thanks Denise 
 Menu extended with week info
 Widget update interval optimized 
 

Version 2.1
 Battery saving measures
 The current week + day is now additionally displayed in the widget.
 

Version 2.0
 The current month is displayed
 A widget is now available.
 	Click and hold on the home screen,
 	Select widget
 	Select the SSWR widget
 Information about the current week.
 	Click on the displayed week or on the button (Current week info)
 About contact information linked.
 

Version 1.0 
 Due date is saved.
